Sunday 10 June — 7:30PM

Henning Wehn

Phil Wang

Fin Taylor

Self styled German Comedy Ambassador Henning Wehn headlines the final show of Bristol Comedy Garden 2018. Expect a hit packed set from the Would I Lie To You Star, packed full of inimitable teutonic jolliness.

Wehn wraps his vowels around the issues of immigration and identity. And he triumphs at it

The Times
Joining Henning is a very special guest to be announced plus Live At The Apollo and Have I Got News For You star Phil Wang making his Comedy Garden debut and the wildly acclaimed Fin Taylor as host.

Festival Opens

6:00PM

Show Starts

7:30PM

Tickets

£20 - 25

Buy Tickets
Queen Square, Bristol BS1 4QS
